entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 01:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: NNE 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain inland early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of thundershowers in the afternoon. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
